{
    "sql": "CREATE TABLE t (d DateTime) ENGINE = MergeTree PARTITION BY toYYYYMMDD(d) ORDER BY tuple(); INSERT INTO t SELECT addDays(now(), number) FROM numbers(100); SELECT DISTINCT 1 FROM t, numbers(1) AS n;",
    "Affected Elements": "DISTINCT, JOIN",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "The DISTINCT clause is not functioning as expected due to the Cartesian product generated by the join with numbers(1), causing non-unique results."
}
